body_html:
Ok, It's my mistake. My problem is fixed after I upgrade my system with the following commands:

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:graphics-drivers/ppa
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade

and then:

reboo

body:
Ok, It's my mistake. My problem is fixed after I upgrade my system with the following commands:

> sudo add-apt-repository ppa:graphics-drivers/ppa
> sudo apt-get update 
> sudo apt-get upgrade

and then:

 reboo
